domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Trump and his administration failed to take coronavirus seriously from the start.

They ignored intelligence warnings.
Didn’t start immediate testing.
Took weeks to utilize the Defense Production Act. 

Now 100,000 to 250,000 Americans are projected to die.
